t: Why are some products, brands, and companies not up on Amazon.com? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 4): There are many reasons. Here are just a couple: 1. Amazon is extremely expensive. They try to convince merchants that the volume more than makes up for the cost 2. If FBA is desired then inventory has to be supplied to Amazon and it is even MORE expensive 3. The terms and condit...

s: Tell your unique brand story. Add compelling imagery and videos. ... Include pages to showcase different categories of your products, your company’s mission, and more.

t: Brand Name missing from Title : r/FulfillmentByAmazon
s: April 24, 2024 - This is an internal experiment that Amazon is running for certain brands. They claim that it increases conversions or some other BS metric that is responsible for this type of title omission. It’s incredibly difficult to have Amazon revert back to having a brand-name display in the title.

t: More brands are leaving Amazon, but the strategy could backfire
s: January 27, 2020 - A growing number of companies are leaving Amazon, but shoppers can still find their products on the site.

t: Brand Name Missing from All Product Listings
s: I have documented this issue with screenshots and openeda few support cases over the months, including the latest Case ID: 16482478411, but have not received a resolution. This inconsistency in brand name display is affecting my product visibility and sales.

t: Brand name missing from product titles
s: Brand name isn't showing up on my product listings in my title, even though my brand name is always listed first. Please assist. All of my listings are "REMTUNE Brand..." and when you find an item I sell the first word shown is BRAND instead of my brand name. I have had no help from amazon.

t: Missing attributes brand / Missing attributes manufacturer - Module Amazon Marketplace
s: January 2, 2015 - On Amazon Brand / Manufacturer field (depending on the category) is mandatory. On Prestashop the field Manufacturer / brand changes its name according to the version, on Prestashop 1.6 it is the Manufacturer field and on Prestashop 1.5 it is the field Brand!
